statements: UPDATE Vendors SET vendor_name='New Vendor Name', email='newemail@example.com' WHERE vendor_id=1;

UPDATE Vendors SET platform_access=False, phone_number='555-5678', vendor_name='XYZ Corp' WHERE vendor_id=2;
UPDATE vendors SET contact_email='newemail@example.com', vendor_location='New York' WHERE vendor_id=1;
UPDATE communication SET receiver_id=2, sender_id=3, message='Hello, updated message' WHERE communication_id=5;

UPDATE documents SET document_content='Updated content' WHERE document_id=2;
